cooldown.title: 🐾 Cat Collection Cooldown
cooldown.description: You need to wait **{{time}}** before collecting another cat.
cooldown.tip: 💡 *Tip: Use `/gallery` to check your current collection while you wait!*
cooldown.footer: Cooldown helps keep cats special and fair for everyone!

success.title: {{rarity_emoji}} Congratulations, {{username}}!
success.footer: MiauDex • Next cat available in 24 hours • Best streak: {{best_streak}} days

errors.invalid_name:
Cat names must be 1-32 characters long and contain valid characters.

❌ **Not allowed:** `<>@#&` and empty names
✅ **Allowed:** Letters, numbers, spaces, and most symbols
errors.reserved_pattern:
⚠️ Names like "cat1", "cat30", etc. are reserved by the system.

🐱 **Pattern blocked:** "cat" followed by numbers
✨ Your cat deserves a more creative and personal name!
errors.examples:
• **Whiskers** - Classic and cute
• **Shadow** - Mysterious and cool
• **Mittens** - Adorable and cozy
• **Luna** - Celestial and beautiful
• **Ziggy** - Playful and unique
errors.creativity_tip: 💡 *Or let the system generate a unique name for you!*
errors.api_failed:
Unable to connect to the cat image service. This is usually temporary.

🔧 **Possible causes:**
• Network connectivity issues
• Cat API maintenance
• Temporary server overload
errors.save_failed:
Your cat was found but couldn't be saved to your collection. Please try again.

If this continues, the database might be temporarily unavailable.

command.option_name_desc: Give your new cat a custom name (1–32 characters, optional)

messages.start: *Start your streak by collecting a cat!*

stats.title: 📈 MiauDex Statistics Dashboard
stats.subtitle: **Real-time insights into the cat collection universe!**
stats.footer: 💡 Click buttons below for detailed insights • Last updated
stats.community_footer: 🌟 Thank you for being part of our community!
stats.error_description: Unable to fetch statistics right now. Please try again in a moment!
stats.error_footer: 🔧 Our team has been notified of this issue

leaderboard.title: 🏆 Cat Leaderboard
leaderboard.subtitle: **The most legendary cat collectors!**
leaderboard.footer: 🐾 Keep collecting to climb the ranks! • Updated every moment
leaderboard.empty_description:
🐾 **The leaderboard is empty!**

🚀 Be the first legendary cat collector!
🔮 Start collecting cats and claim your throne!
leaderboard.error_description: 🐾 Unable to fetch the leaderboard right now. Please try again!
leaderboard.stats_progress_no_data: Start collecting to see your progress!

vote.title: 🗳️ Vote for MiauDex!
vote.subtitle: ✨ Support the bot and earn rewards!
vote.description: Vote every 12 hours to earn cats and unlock achievements!
vote.vote_rewards_value: Earn cats and special badges for voting!
vote.leaderboard_error_desc: Something went wrong while fetching the leaderboard.
vote.reminder_enabled_desc:
🔔 Perfect! Vote reminders are now active!

➡ You'll get a DM when you can vote again.
🚀 Each reminder includes direct voting links.
💖 Never miss a vote and earn more cats!

✅ Test message sent successfully - Check your DMs!
vote.reminder_enabled_footer: Test message sent successfully - Check your DMs!
vote.reminder_disabled_desc: ❌ Reminders disabled. You can re-enable anytime.
vote.dm_error_desc:
🔔 Oops! We can't send you DM notifications.

➡ **To enable vote reminders:**
✅ Go to **User Settings** (gear icon)
✅ Navigate to **Privacy & Safety**
✅ Enable **Allow DMs from server members**
✅ Or add MiauDex as a friend

✨ **Why DMs?**
💖 Avoid spam in the server
🚀 Instant notifications
💎 Personalized experience!
vote.dm_error_footer: 💡 Once you fix your DM settings, try enabling reminders again!
vote.reminder_success_desc:
🔔 Perfect! Vote reminders are now active!

✨ **What happens next?**
➡ You'll receive a DM reminder when you can vote again
🚀 Each reminder will include direct voting links
💖 Never miss a vote and earn more cats!

✅ **Test message sent successfully** - Check your DMs!
vote.stats_subtitle: ✨ Detailed breakdown of your voting journey
vote.keep_voting_footer: Keep voting to unlock more achievements! • {{date}}

trade.proposal_description:
{{target}}, {{username}} wants to trade cats with you!

⏳ **Choose your response below**
⏰ You have {{time}} seconds to decide
trade.success_description:
✅ **Trade successful!**
Both cats have been transferred to their new owners.
trade.cancelled_description: No response received within the time limit.

errors.invalid_initiator: You cannot initiate trades as a bot
errors.self_trade:
You cannot trade with yourself! 🤔

Try finding another user to trade with instead.
errors.invalid_cat_name: Cat names must be 1-{{max}} characters long and contain valid characters.
errors.settings_check_failed: Unable to verify {{username}}'s trade settings. They may need to use the bot first.
errors.trades_disabled:
{{username}} has disabled cat trading.

They can enable it using: `/profile`
errors.cat_not_found:
You don't have a cat named "{{name}}".

Use `/gallery` to see your available cats.
errors.target_cat_not_found:
{{username}} doesn't have a cat named "{{name}}".

You can check their collection with `/gallery`
errors.rarity_mismatch:
Cats must be the same rarity to trade!

{{my_emoji}} Your cat: **{{my_rarity}}**
{{their_emoji}} Their cat: **{{their_rarity}}**

*This keeps trades fair for everyone.*
errors.lookup_failed: Unable to find cat in the database. Please try again.
errors.trade_failed:
An error occurred while transferring the cats. The trade has been cancelled.

Both cats remain with their original owners.
errors.unexpected_error:
Something unexpected happened while processing your trade.

Please try again in a few moments.

command.option_user_desc: The user you want to trade with
command.option_yourcat_desc: The name of your cat for the trade
command.option_theircat_desc: The name of their cat you want

rarity.title: ✨ 🐱 Cat Rarities 🐱 ✨
rarity.subtitle: 🌌 **Welcome to the magical world of cat rarities!**
rarity.description:
ℹ️ Each cat has a unique rarity that determines its color and how special it is.
🎲 The rarer the cat, the harder it is to find!
rarity.footer: 🪄 Rarity affects embed color • Use dropdown to explore individual rarities

tips.easy: 💖 **Easy to collect!** Vote regularly to build up your collection.
tips.moderate: 🎯 **Moderate challenge.** Daily voting will get you these over time.
tips.serious: 🔥 **Serious dedication required.** Consistent voting is key!
tips.ultra_rare: 👑 **Ultra rare!** These require incredible patience and luck.
tips.legendary: 🌌 **Legendary status!** The absolute rarest - true collector's prizes!

rarity.details_footer: Part of the MiauDex rarity system • Select another rarity to explore more!
rarity.select_placeholder: 🔍 Select a rarity to learn more...

main.title: MiauDex Command Center
main.description:
**Welcome to the ultimate cat collection experience!**

{{sparkles}} **{{totalCommands}} commands** available to enhance your journey
{{cat}} Collect rare cats, compete with friends, and become a legend!

**Choose a category below to explore commands:**
main.footer: 💡 Pro tip: Use the dropdown menu to explore specific categories!

collection.name: 🐱 Collection
collection.description: Manage and view your cat collection

social.name: 👥 Social & Competition
social.description: Compete and interact with other collectors

rewards.name: 🎁 Rewards & Voting
rewards.description: Get rewards and support the bot

category.no_commands: No commands found in this category.
category.footer: 🔍 Use the menu to explore other categories • {{count}} commands shown

quickstart.title: Quick Start Guide
quickstart.subtitle: **New to MiauDex? Start your legendary journey here!**

step1.title: Step 1: Get Your First Cat
step1.description: Use `/cat` to get a free random cat!

step2.title: Step 2: Check Your Collection
step2.description: Use `/gallery` to view all your collected cats and their rarity.

step3.title: Step 3: Climb the Leaderboard
step3.description: Use `/top` to see where you rank among other collectors.

step4.title: Step 4: Customize Your Experience
step4.description: Use `/profile` to manage your settings and preferences.

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.content:
• Vote every 12 hours for consistent rewards
• Rare cats are more valuable for rankings
• Join our community for exclusive events!

quickstart.footer: 🎯 Ready to become a cat collection legend?

menu.placeholder: 🔍 Choose a command category to explore...

main.title: Join the MiauDex Community!
main.description:
{{rainbow}} **Welcome to the ultimate cat collector's paradise!**

{{community}} Connect with other cat enthusiasts
{{support}} Get instant help and support from our amazing team
{{gift}} Participate in exclusive events and giveaways
{{news}} Stay updated with the latest MiauDex features

{{arrow}} [**Click here to join the adventure!**]({{invite_link}})
{{bot}} [**Add MiauDex to your server!**]({{bot_invite_link}})

whats_inside.title: What's Inside?

{{chat}} **Active Community** - Chat with cat lovers worldwide
{{trophy}} **Leaderboards** - See who's the top collector

{{target}} **Events** - Special contests and challenges

exclusive_perks.title: Exclusive Perks

main.footer: {{heart}} Join {{users}}+ registered collectors in our growing community!

giveaway.title: Daily Cat Giveaways

{{arrow}} **Only available in the [MiauDex Server]({{invite_link}})!**

giveaway.footer: {{wink}} Don't miss your daily chance - join now and start winning!

errors.unexpected:
Something unexpected happened while collecting your cat.

The development team has been notified. Please try again in a few minutes.

rename.invalid_name_description:
⚠️ There was an issue with the name "{{name}}".

✨ Please try a different name for your cat!
rename.choose_loving_name: Choose a loving name for your furry friend! 🐾
rename.reserved_pattern_description:
⚠️ Names like "**{{name}}**" are reserved by the system.

🐱 **Pattern blocked:** "cat" followed by numbers (like cat1, cat30, etc.)
✨ Your cat deserves a more creative and personal name!
rename.name_too_long_description:
😿 Your cat's name "{{name}}" is **{{length}}** characters long.

✏️ **Maximum allowed:** 20 characters
✨ Try a shorter, cuter name!
rename.choose_perfect_fit: Choose a name that fits perfectly! 🐾
rename.invalid_characters_description:
⚠️ The name "{{name}}" contains invalid characters.

✅ **Allowed characters:**
• Letters (A-Z, a-z)
• Numbers (0-9)
• Spaces, hyphens (-), underscores (_)

❌ **Not allowed:** Emojis, special symbols
rename.cat_not_found_description:
🐱 I couldn't find a cat named "**{{name}}**" in your collection.

✨ **Double-check the spelling** and try again!
rename.quick_tips_content:
• Names are **case-sensitive**
• Use `/gallery` to see all your cats
• Make sure you own this cat
rename.gallery_tip: Tip: Use /gallery to see all your furry friends! 🐾
rename.name_taken_description:
🐱 You already have a cat named "**{{name}}**"!

✨ Each cat in your collection needs a **unique name**.
rename.unique_name_footer: Make each cat special with a unique name! ✨
rename.success_description:
✨ **Congratulations!** Your cat transformation is complete!

🐱 **"{{oldName}}"** is now proudly called **"{{newName}}"**!
rename.fun_fact_content: Did you know? Your cat will remember this special moment forever! {{newName}} is now ready for new adventures! 💖
rename.celebration_message: 🌈 **{{newName}}** is settling into their new name beautifully! 😻 They seem to love it!
rename.celebration_footer: Your cat collection just got even more special! 🌟

command.option_new_desc: ✨ A shiny new name for your cat

jump_modal.invalid: ❌ Invalid cat number. Enter a number between 1 and {{max}}.

profanity.warning_title: Meow... That's not a nice name!
profanity.warning_description: I can't use that name for your kitty. Let's call them **{{newName}}** instead!
profanity.reminder: 🐱 **Remember:** Our cats deserve loving, kind names!
profanity.tip: 💝 **Tip:** Try names like Luna, Milo, Bella, or just let me pick a number!
